name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - X, Y & Z  | 10 Questions

questions.text: There is only one Beanie Baby that starts with the letter X, and it is the alphabet Beanie.  What color is the X?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	There is a Beanie Baby for each letter of the alphabet.  Each bear is brown and holds a different letter.  Each can also hang on a Christmas tree, or anywhere else around the house!  These special bears have no poems.

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Yapper.

	Yapper is a Shitszu puppy.  She is black and brown with very long and soft hair.  She has a red bow in her hair. "I love riding in the carAs long as we don't go too farSo take me on a little tripAnd I'll let out a playful 'YIP!'"

questions.text: Which of these is a congratulatory bear?
questions.explanation:
You Did It!.

	You Did It! is a curly brown bear.  He holds a card in his hands that say "You Did It!"  There are party toys and confetti on the card.  He has no poem.

Yummy.

	While "Yragus" may spell "sugary" backwards, that Beanie Baby doesn't exist.  It should though, it is cute, isn't it?  :-D  Anyway, Yummy is a dark brown bear that holds a peppermint in his arms.  He wears a red and green striped hat. "Cookies, cakes, and any sweetsThese are my most favorite treats In my stocking, hope I see Some peppermint that's just for me!"

questions.text: Which of these is a bird that may rule the land?
questions.explanation:
Zero.

	Zero is an Emperor penguin.  Emperors are rulers of land, usually in the Asian countries like Japan, mostly thought of in this way in ancient times.  Zero wears a red and white hat on his head. "Penguins love the ice and snowPlaying in weather twenty belowAntarctica is where I love to beSplashing in the cold, cold sea!"

questions.text: Which of these is a moose?
questions.explanation:
Zeus.

	Zeus is a moose, because Zeus and moose rhyme!  Zizzle Zazzle Zuzz is a made up creature in many Dr. Seuss books. "With mighty antlers on my headIt's difficult to get in bedBut I sleep better, yes I doWhen I am cuddled next to you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a zebra?
questions.explanation:
Ziggy.

	Ziggy is a zebra, so he is a white horse-like animal with black stripes and a black mane.  Or is he a black animal with white stripes and a black mane? !  I guess we'll never know! It is quite interesting to note that no two zebras have the exact same pattern on them!  Same with giraffes.  While this is true with real animals, Beanie Babies are designed to all be the same! "Ziggy likes soccer - he's a refereeThat way he watches the games for freeThe other Beanies don't think it's fairBut Ziggy the Zebra doesn't care!"

questions.text: Which of these is a cat?
questions.explanation:
Zip.

	Zip is a black cat with white feet and inside of the ears.  Some versions of Zip include having a white face, and even a white belly, although these are much more rare and can only be bought from collectors, usually.  Zip has green eyes in the older versions, but brown on the newer version.  The Teanie Beanie Zip also has green eyes. "Keep Zip by your side all the day throughZip is good luck, you'll see it's trueWhen you have something you need to doZip will always believe in you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a turtle?
questions.explanation:
Zoom.

	Zoom is a colorful sea turtle.  "Zoom!" is an old children's television show! "Moving along at my own paceI may not always win the raceBut sometimes life can be more funWhen we don't try for number one!"

questions.text: Which of these is a monkey?
questions.explanation:
Zoomer.

	Zoomer is a blue monkey.  He was the February 2006 Beanie Baby of the month.  He appears all blue, but he is a couple different shades of blue, one of which appears to be greenish in color.  He has a white beard. "I zoom through the air, to and froSwinging and swinging, just watch me goI really love my life in the treesYou'll like it too, it's such a breeze!"
